column2: When this timer runs out we can use the 'Levy Indian Taxes' decision.
When this timer runs out we can use the 'Give India Money' decision.
Prussia is influencing our country, one day they might demand political integration.
We are applying pressure to the north german duchies and principalites to further their political integration with Prussia.
Non-Accepted Bureaucrats Decision Cooldown is 10 years.
Cooldown Timer for Mine RGO Change Decisions
Cooldown Timer for Farm RGO Change Decisions
The bonus immigration attraction from the midgame Homestead Act has been applied at the start of the game.
The infrastructure and development of this treaty port has vastly increased our RGO capacity!
We have recently taken a Chinese treaty port, this is the cooldown flag until another may be taken.
Negotiating an unequal treaty with foreigners.
Chinese research points from quest nerf (only matters for uncivs)
An Alternative Homestead Act established by Mexico.
This modifier exists to counter the engine restricted assimilation modifier on pops who are on their cultural_union cores.
You have an active Police State.
You have an active One Party State.
You have an active Totalitarianist government.
Your people are enthralled by the Leadership Principle.
Your people are enthralled by Ultranationalism.
Your people are enthralled by Collectivisation.
Your people have created a Classless Society.
World Bank Funding modifier to raise the precious metals production of the world bank.
We have recently fired unaccepted bureaucrats to save on our administrative spending.
Force another §Ycountry§W to pay reparations to us
This country is a target for immigration. It should expect more immigrants than comparable countries.
To reach this country requires a hazardous Journey which few people is willing to take. As a result, this nation should expect fewer immigrants than comparable countries.
We have enacted the Tanzimat reforms.
We have lost a war and like vultures, the westerners descended upon us imposing their conditions including the opening of our country, monetary reparations and even the secession of territory.
Our diplomats are negotiating a treaty with a defeated nation.
We negotiated a treaty with the Chinese and acquired the rights over a Chinese port and city.

Forces the AI set Tarrifs Low.
Forces the AI to set Tariffs High.
You have recently taken a decision to change a RGO, you must wait a while before doing so again.
The province has just switched its major production, and locals are still acclimatizing to the change.
After this modifier runs down you will have access to a decision while at war to deploy the Solomon Virus.
Once considered legend, now revived and modified to be even more infectious & deadly, this weapon can wipe out entire countries once deployed.
You must wait till the modifier disappears before deploying The Solomon Virus again.
Due to the unemployment caused by switching to Lumber RGO, this province will not have any migration for two years untill pops can be reemployed with time.
A temporary market reset for Lumber prices inorder to fix the unemployment bug caused by switching a province to a Lumber RGO.
Prevents Pandemic Influenza from recurring in your country as long as modifier is active.
No More War Reperations Can be Added on You.

Due to the nature of stacking of War Reperations by multiple countries on a single nation, it is possible to earn 80% or even 120% of all income in a country leading to a unrecoverable situation when Reperations are added every-war.
We have changed our capital and as a result we may not do this again for a period of time
We have formed Little Italy and as a result are getting an influx of peoples mostly from Italy looking for a new home...
